comments:

This appears to be a problem in our MethodImpl

When we ask a ReferenceTypeImpl for allLineLocations, it gets all methods and 
asks them for their line locations. The request for a native method comes back 
with a NATIVE_METHOD error code. Added code to our error handling in 
MethodImpl#getLineTable() to throw an AbsentInformationException when a 
NATIVE_METHOD error code is returned.
